headline: Will LKQ’s (LKQ) New Chairman Shape Its Transformation or Reinforce the Status Quo?
summary: LKQ Corporation has announced that John Mendel was elected Chairman of the Board earlier this month, following Guhan Subramanian's decision to step down from the role and retire from the Board in January 2026. Mendel's extensive experience in automotive and distribution leadership at American Honda, Ford, and Mazda America is viewed as an important factor in the Board’s ongoing efforts to enhance corporate governance practices. We'll explore how Mendel's appointment as Chairman could...
